mapper.select: SELECT USR.stu_id as ID FROM student USR WHERE USR.stu_name = #{fullNameKO} AND USR.birth = #{birth};

select A.stu_id as id, A.stu_name as name, birth as birth, case A.coll when 1 then "창의ICT공과대학" end as univ_course, case A.dep when 1 then "전자전기공학부" end as univ_group, case A.cur when "BS" then "학부" end as course, A.admission_date as admission_date, A.completion_date as change_date FROM student A where A.stu_id = #{key};

select A.year as year, case A.seme when 1 then "1학기" when 2 then "2학기" when 3 then "여름학기" when 4 then "겨울학기" end as semester, case A.cla_cls when 1 then "전공선택선" when 2 then "전공기초" when 3 then "전공필수" when 4 then "자유선택" when 5 then "교양필수" when 6 then "핵심교양" end as lecture_no, A.cur_tit as lecture_name, A.cur_cred as score_result, case B.score when 0 then "F" when 63 then "D" when 67 then "D+" when 73 then "C" when 77 then "C+" when 83 then "B" when 87 then "B+" when 93 then "A" when 97 then "A+" end as grade_result FROM course A inner join enrollment B on A.cur_serial_no = B.cur_serial_no where B.stu_id = #{key};

select A.year as year, case A.seme when 1 then "1학기" when 2 then "2학기" when 3 then "여름학기" when 4 then "겨울학기" end as semester, sum(A.cur_cred) as score_result, sum(case B.score when 0 then 0 when 63 then 1 when 67 then 1.5 when 73 then 2 when 77 then 2.5 when 83 then 3 when 87 then 3.5 when 93 then 4 when 97 then 4.5 end) / count(*) as grade_result FROM course A inner join enrollment B on A.cur_serial_no = B.cur_serial_no where B.stu_id = #{key} group by year, semester;
